EmailTemplate.description: EGPWS-D: Purchasing a physical card - terrain database
EmailTemplate.name: EGPWS-D Card Purchase
EmailTemplate.subject: EGPWS-D: Terrain database card purchase
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting Honeywell.
Thank you for contacting Honeywell.
If you would like to purchase a terrain database PCMCIA card loaded with current region and you have a subscription with us for the terrain DB service, please send a Purchase Order with the following information: part number, bill to address, ship to address, and the price of the card including shipping ($__________).
Once we receive the purchase order, we can enter your order.
Please let us know if you need further information.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Database Services Accounts
dsa@honeywell.com
{!EmailMessage.TextBody}
